meanings.definition: Covered in a sticky or slimy substance
meanings.sent1: The goopiest slime dripped down the wall.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were the goopiest after playing with the slime.
meanings.sent3: The goopiest mess was impossible to clean up.
meanings.sent4: The goopiest mud made squelching sounds with each step.
meanings.sent5: The goopiest glue held the pieces together firmly.
